Note: A derivation in predicate logic need not use any of the 
quantifier-specific rules. The first four problems below are examples of this 
point.

\begin{enumerate}
 \setlength{\itemsep}{2em}

 \item Add missing annotations:


\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated by gentzen

\ai{Γ}{Fc\mc{\lor }Gd}{premise}

\ai{Δ}{Fc\mc{\limplies }Fk}{premise}

\ai{Θ}{Gd\mc{\limplies }He}{premise}

\ai{Fc}{Fc}{\mask{A}}

\ai{Δ, Fc}{Fk}{\mask{2,4,\condE}}

\ai{Δ, Fc}{Fk\mc{\lor }He}{\mask{5,\disjI}}

\ai{Gd}{Gd}{\mask{A}}

\ai{Θ, Gd}{He}{\mask{3,7,\condE}}

\ai{Θ, Gd}{Fk\mc{\lor }He}{\mask{8,\disjI}}

\ai{Γ, Δ, Θ}{Fk\mc{\lor }He}{\mask{1,6,9,\disjE}}

\end{argumentN}

\item Add missing annotations:

\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated by gentzen

\ai{Γ}{\lforall x Fx\mc{\lor }\lthereis x Gx}{premise}

\ai{Δ}{\lforall x Fx\mc{\limplies }\lnot\lforall x Fx}{premise}

\ai{Θ}{\lthereis x Gx\mc{\limplies }\lforall x Hx}{premise}

\ai{\lforall x Fx}{\lforall x Fx}{\mask{A}}

\ai{Δ, \lforall x Fx}{\lnot\lforall x Fx}{\mask{2,4,\condE}}

\ai{Δ, \lforall x Fx}{\lnot\lforall x Fx\mc{\lor }\lforall x Hx}{\mask{5,\disjI}}

\ai{\lthereis x Gx}{\lthereis x Gx}{\mask{A}}

\ai{Θ, \lthereis x Gx}{\lforall x Hx}{\mask{3,7,\condE}}

\ai{Θ, \lthereis x Gx}{\lnot\lforall x Fx\mc{\lor }\lforall x Hx}{\mask{8,\disjI}}

\ai{Γ, Δ, Θ}{\lnot\lforall x Fx\mc{\lor }\lforall x Hx}{\mask{1,6,9,\disjE}}

\end{argumentN}


\newpage

\item Fill in the missing items.

\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated by gentzen

\ai{Γ}{Fa\mc{\lor }(Lb\lor Kc)}{premise}

\ai{Fa}{Fa}{A}

\ai{\mask{Kc}}{\mask{Kc}}{A}

\ai{Kc}{(Fa\lor Lb)\mc{\lor }Kc}{3,\mask{\disjI}}

\ai{\mask{Fa}}{\mask{Fa\mc{\lor }Lb}}{2,\disjI}

\ai{\mask{Lb}}{\mask{Lb}}{A}

\ai{Lb}{\mask{Fa\mc{\lor }Lb}}{6,\mask{\disjI}}

\ai{\mask{Fa}}{\mask{(Fa\lor Lb)\mc{\lor }Kc}}{5,\disjI}

\ai{Lb\mc{\lor }Kc}{Lb\mc{\lor }Kc}{A}

\ai{\mask{Lb}}{(Fa\lor Lb)\mc{\lor }Kc}{7,\disjI}

\ai{\mask{Lb\mc{\lor }Kc}}{\mask{(Fa\lor Lb)\mc{\lor }Kc}}{\mask{4,9,10,\disjE}}

\ai{Γ}{(Fa\lor Lb)\mc{\lor }Kc}{1,8,11,\disjE}

\end{argumentN}

\item Fill in the missing items.

\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated by gentzen

\ai{Γ}{\lthereis x Fx\mc{\lor }(\lforall x Lx\lor \lthereis x Kx)}{premise}

\ai{\lthereis x Fx}{\lthereis x Fx}{A}

\ai{\mask{\lthereis x Kx}}{\mask{\lthereis x Kx}}{A}

\ai{\lthereis x Kx}{(\lthereis x Fx\lor \lforall x Lx)\mc{\lor }\lthereis x Kx}{3,\mask{\disjI}}

\ai{\mask{\lthereis x Fx}}{\mask{\lthereis x Fx\mc{\lor }\lforall x Lx}}{2,\disjI}

\ai{\mask{\lforall x Lx}}{\mask{\lforall x Lx}}{A}

\ai{\lforall x Lx}{\mask{\lthereis x Fx\mc{\lor }\lforall x Lx}}{6,\mask{\disjI}}

\ai{\mask{\lthereis x Fx}}{\mask{(\lthereis x Fx\lor \lforall x Lx)\mc{\lor }\lthereis x Kx}}{5,\disjI}

\ai{\lforall x Lx\mc{\lor }\lthereis x Kx}{\lforall x Lx\mc{\lor }\lthereis x Kx}{A}

\ai{\mask{\lforall x Lx}}{(\lthereis x Fx\lor \lforall x Lx)\mc{\lor }\lthereis x Kx}{7,\disjI}

\ai{\mask{\lforall x Lx\mc{\lor }\lthereis x Kx}}{\mask{(\lthereis x Fx\lor \lforall x Lx)\mc{\lor }\lthereis x Kx}}{\mask{4,9,10,\disjE}}

\ai{Γ}{(\lthereis x Fx\lor \lforall x Lx)\mc{\lor }\lthereis x Kx}{1,8,11,\disjE}

\end{argumentN}

\newpage

 \item Fill in missing items.


%title: %\forall xFx,\forall xGx\vdash \forall x(Fx\wedge Gx)
\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated  by  gentzen

 \ai{\mask{\mc{\lforall  x  }Fx}}{\mc{\lforall  x  }Fx}{A}

 \ai{\mc{\lforall  x  }Gx}{\mask{\mc{\lforall  x  }Gx}}{A}

 \ai{\mask{\mc{\lforall  x  }Fx}}{\mask{Fa}}{1,\uniE}

 \ai{\mask{\mc{\lforall  x  }Gx}}{\mask{Ga}}{2,\uniE}

 \ai{\mask{\mc{\lforall  x  }Fx,  \mc{\lforall  x  }Gx}}{Fa\mc{\land  }Ga}{3,4,
\conjI}

\ai{\mc{\lforall  x  }Fx,  \mc{\lforall  x  }Gx}{\mc{\lforall  x  }(Fx\land  Gx)}
{\mask{5,\uniI}}

\end{argumentN}

\item Fill in missing items.


%title: %
\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated  by  gentzen

 \ai{\mask{\lforall  x  Fx\mc{\lor  }\lforall  x  Gx}}{\mask{\lforall  x  
   Fx\mc{\lor  }
 \lforall  x  Gx}}{A}

 \ai{\mask{\mc{\lforall  x  }Fx}}{\mc{\lforall  x  }Fx}{A}

 \ai{\mask{\mc{\lforall  x  }Fx}}{\mask{Fk}}{2,\uniE}

 \ai{\mask{\mc{\lforall  x  }Fx}}{\mask{Fk}\mc{\lor  }Gk}{3,\disjI}

 \ai{\mc{\lforall  x  }Gx}{\mc{\lforall  x  }Gx}{\mask{A}}

 \ai{\mask{\mc{\lforall  x  }Gx}}{\mask{Gk}}{5,\uniE}

 \ai{\mask{\mc{\lforall  x  }Gx}}{Fk\mc{\lor  }\mask{Gk}}{6,\disjI}

\ai{\lforall  x  Fx\mc{\lor  }\lforall  x  Gx}{Fk\mc{\lor  }Gk}{1,4,7,\disjE}

\ai{\mask{\lforall  x  Fx\mc{\lor  }\lforall  x  Gx}}{\mc{\lforall  x  }(Fx\lor  
Gx)}
{8,\uniI}

\end{argumentN}

\item Fill in missing items.

%title: %\forall xFx\vdash \exists xFx
\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated  by  gentzen

 \ai{\mc{\lforall  x  }Fx}{\mc{\lforall  x  }Fx}{\mask{A}}

\ai{\mc{\lforall  x  }Fx}{Fa}{\mask{1,\uniE}}

\ai{\mc{\lforall  x  }Fx}{\mc{\lthereis  x  }Fx}{\mask{2,\exI}}

\end{argumentN}

\newpage

\item Fill in missing items.
%title: %
\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated  by  gentzen

\ai{\mc{\lnot  }\lforall  x  Fx}{\mc{\lnot  }\lforall  x  Fx}{A}

\ai{\mc{\lnot  }\lthereis  x  \lnot  Fx}{\mc{\lnot  }\lthereis  x  \lnot  Fx}{A}

\ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot  }Fa}}{\mask{\mc{\lnot  }Fa}}{A}

\ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot  }Fa}}{\mask{\mc{\lthereis  x  }\lnot  Fx}}{3,\exI}

\ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot  }\lthereis  x  \lnot  Fx,  \mc{\lnot  }Fa}}{\mask{\mc{\lnot  
  }
\lthereis  x  \lnot  Fx}}{2}

\ai{\mc{\lnot  }\lthereis  x  \lnot  Fx}{\mask{\mc{\lnot  }\lnot  Fa}}{4,5,\negI}

\ai{\mc{\lnot  }\lthereis  x  \lnot  Fx}{Fa}{6,\negE}

\ai{\mc{\lnot  }\lthereis  x  \lnot  Fx}{\mc{\lforall  x  }Fx}{\mask{7,\uniI}}

\ai{\mc{\lnot  }\lforall  x  Fx,  \mc{\lnot  }\lthereis  x  \lnot  Fx}{\mc{\lnot  
}\lforall  x  Fx}{\mask{1}}

\ai{\mc{\lnot  }\lforall  x  Fx}{\mc{\lnot  }\lnot  \lthereis  x  \lnot  Fx}
{\mask{8,
9,\negI}}

\ai{\mc{\lnot  }\lforall  x  Fx}{\mc{\lthereis  x  }\lnot  Fx}{10,\negE}

\end{argumentN}




\item Fill in missing items.

%title: %\neg \exists xFx\vdash \exists x\neg Fx
\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated  by  gentzen

\ai{\mc{\lnot  }\lthereis  x  Fx}{\mc{\lnot  }\lthereis  x  Fx}{A}

\ai{\mask{Fa}}{\mask{Fa}}{A}

\ai{\mask{Fa}}{\mask{\mc{\lthereis  x  }Fx}}{2,\exI}

\ai{\mask{\mc{\lnot  }\lthereis  x  Fx,  Fa}}{\mask{\mc{\lnot  }\lthereis  x  
Fx}}
{1}

\ai{\mc{\lnot  }\lthereis  x  Fx}{\mc{\lnot  }Fa}{3,4,\negI}

\ai{\mc{\lnot  }\lthereis  x  Fx}{\mc{\lthereis  x  }\lnot  Fx}{5,\exI}

\end{argumentN}

\item Fill in missing items. Hint: Line 1 is a theorem of sentential logic.  
 Lines 2 and 3 are simply citing the results of Q3 and Q4; leave them untouched.
%title: %
\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated  by  gentzen

 \ai{}{\mask{\lforall  x  Fx\mc{\lor  }\lnot  \lforall  x  Fx}}{\mask{EM}}

\ai{\mc{\lforall  x  }Fx}{\mc{\lthereis  x  }Fx}{Q3 above}

\ai{\mc{\lnot  }\lforall  x  Fx}{\mc{\lthereis  x  }\lnot  Fx}{Q4 above}

\ai{\mc{\lforall  x  }Fx}{\mask{\lthereis  x  Fx\mc{\lor  }\lthereis  x  \lnot  
Fx}}
{\mask{2,
\disjI}}

\ai{\mc{\lnot  }\lforall  x  Fx}{\mask{\lthereis  x  Fx\mc{\lor  }\lthereis  x  
\lnot  Fx}}{\mask{3,\disjI}}

\ai{}{\lthereis  x  Fx\mc{\lor  }\lthereis  x  \lnot  Fx}{1,4,5,\disjE}

\end{argumentN}


\item Fill in missing items.

%title: %\forall x(Fx\supset Gx),\forall x\neg Gx\vdash \forall x\neg Fx
\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated  by  gentzen

\ai[0.28]{\mc{\lforall  x  }(Fx\limplies  Gx)}{\mc{\lforall  x  }(Fx\limplies  Gx)}
{\mask{A}}

\ai[0.28]{\mask{\mc{\lforall  x  }\lnot  Gx}}{\mask{\mc{\lforall  x  }\lnot  Gx}}{A}

\ai[0.28]{\mask{\mc{\lforall  x  }(Fx\limplies  Gx)}}{\mask{Fa\mc{\limplies  }Ga}}{1,
\uniE}

\ai[0.28]{\mask{Fa}}{\mask{Fa}}{\mask{A}}

\ai[0.28]{\mc{\lforall  x  }(Fx\limplies  Gx),  Fa}{Ga}{3,4,\condE}

\ai[0.28]{\mask{\mc{\lforall  x  }\lnot  Gx}}{\mc{\lnot  }Ga}{2,\uniE}

\ai[0.28]{\mask{\mc{\lforall  x  }\lnot  Gx,  Fa}}{\mc{\lnot  }Ga}{\mask{6}}

\ai[0.28]{\mc{\lforall  x  }(Fx\limplies  Gx),  \mc{\lforall  x  }\lnot  Gx}{\mc{\lnot  }Fa}{5,7,\negI}

\ai[0.28]{\mask{\mc{\lforall  x  }(Fx\limplies  Gx),  \mc{\lforall  x  }\lnot  
Gx}}
{\mc{\lforall  x  }\lnot  Fx}{8,\uniI}

\end{argumentN}

\item Fill in missing items. 
%title: %\exists xFx\vee \exists xGx\vdash \exists x(Fx\vee Gx)
\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated  by  gentzen

\ai{\lthereis  x  Fx\mc{\lor  }\lthereis  x  Gx}{\lthereis  x  Fx\mc{\lor  }\lthereis  x  Gx}{A}

\ai{\mask{\mc{\lthereis  x  }Fx}}{\mask{\mc{\lthereis  x  }Fx}}{\mask{A}}

\ai{\mask{Fa}}{\mask{Fa}}{A}

\ai{\mask{Fa}}{\mask{Fa\mc{\lor  }Ga}}{3,\disjI}

\ai{Fa}{\mask{\mc{\lthereis  x  }(Fx\lor  Gx)}}{4,\exI}

\ai{\mc{\lthereis  x  }Fx}{\mc{\lthereis  x  }(Fx\lor  Gx)}{2,5,\exE}

\ai{\mc{\lthereis  x  }Gx}{\mc{\lthereis  x  }Gx}{A}

\ai{\mask{Gb}}{\mask{Gb}}{A}

\ai{\mask{Gb}}{\mask{Fb\mc{\lor  }Gb}}{8,\disjI}

\ai{\mask{Gb}}{\mask{\mc{\lthereis  x  }(Fx\lor  Gx)}}{9,\exI}

\ai{\mc{\lthereis  x  }Gx}{\mc{\lthereis  x  }(Fx\lor  Gx)}{7,10,\exE}

\ai{\lthereis  x  Fx\mc{\lor  }\lthereis  x  Gx}{\mc{\lthereis  x  }(Fx\lor  Gx)}
{\mask{1,6,11,\disjE}}

\end{argumentN}
\newpage


\item 
%title: %\exists xFx\vee \exists xGx,\forall x(Fx\supset Gx)\vdash \exists xGx
\begin{argumentN}[1]
%generated  by  gentzen

\ai[0.32]{\lthereis  x  Fx\mc{\lor  }\lthereis  x  Gx}{\lthereis  x  Fx\mc{\lor  
}\lthereis  x  Gx}{\mask{A}}

\ai[0.32]{\mc{\lforall  x  }(Fx\limplies  Gx)}{\mc{\lforall  x  }(Fx\limplies  
Gx)}{\mask{A}}

\ai[0.32]{\mc{\lthereis  x  }Fx}{\mc{\lthereis  x  }Fx}{\mask{A}}

\ai[0.32]{Fa}{Fa}{\mask{A}}

\ai[0.32]{\mc{\lforall  x  }(Fx\limplies  Gx)}{Fa\mc{\limplies  }Ga}{\mask{2,
\uniE}}

\ai[0.32]{\mc{\lforall  x  }(Fx\limplies  Gx),  Fa}{Ga}{\mask{4,5,\condE}}

\ai[0.32]{\mc{\lforall  x  }(Fx\limplies  Gx),  Fa}{\mc{\lthereis  x  }Gx}
{\mask{6,
\exI}}

\ai[0.32]{\mc{\lforall  x  }(Fx\limplies  Gx),  \mc{\lthereis  x  }Fx}
{\mc{\lthereis  x  }Gx}{\mask{3,7,\exE}}

\ai[0.32]{\mc{\lthereis  x  }Gx}{\mc{\lthereis  x  }Gx}{\mask{A}}

\ai[0.32]{\lthereis  x  Fx\mc{\lor  }\lthereis  x  Gx,  \mc{\lforall  x  }
(Fx\limplies  Gx)}{\mc{\lthereis  x  }Gx}{\mask{1,8,9,\disjE}}

\end{argumentN}

\end{enumerate}
